title: Well, hello there...
message: This website is in active development, so please excuse any bugs, blank pages, typos, or non-responsive behavior. If you're a recruiter, all of my relevant information should currently be on the site, but things may change/be updated as time goes on. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me using the "contact me!" button in the top right. Otherwise, feel free to roam the site as I add to it!
